attributes.action: Molyneux Park Road, TN4 8DN. Road in URGENT need of speed control measures.
attributes.additional_details:
Multiple local residents living on this road have pets and small children along with MANY elderly people, all of which are at risk of serious injury due to these irresponsible and selfish drivers. The law clearly states no higher than 30MPH - but this is constantly abused.
We URGENTLY need a speed control measure on this road!
attributes.background:
People keep speeding up and down Molyneux Park Road, TN4 8DN.
People do not slow down when going up and doing this long stretch of road, the road has no speed control measures, and everyone seems to use it as a "drag strip" with speeds up to 60+ MPH in a 30MPH zone, surely this warrants action.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of your local council. 
 
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
